'''In the End, the Forest Will Remember''' is the fourth part of the [[Aranyaka]] [[World Quest]] series.

==Quests==
# [["Hello," "Thank You," and the Final "Goodbye"]]

==Summary==
[[Arana]] awakens to the Traveler and Paimon, who introduce themselves once more. Noticing the gaps in his memories, Arana correctly deduces the events that happened. The Traveler and Paimon persuades Arana to visit [[Rana]] together, even if he no longer remembers her. Back at the Aranara house, the Traveler uses the [[Bija]] to wake Rana up. After sharing the stories that occurred, Rana asks Arana once more to travel together and fill the "void" in his heart, to which Arana accepts. Rana then gains a {{Dendro}} [[Vision]].
